actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to revise the funding and deduction rules for multiemployer defined benefit plans, and for other purposes.
short_title: Multiemployer Plan Funding and Deduction Reform Act of 2005

summary.text: Multiemployer Plan Funding and Deduction Reform Act of 2005 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) and the Internal Revenue Code to revise rules for funding, disclosure, and deduction for multiemployer defined benefit plans.

titles.title: Multiemployer Plan Funding and Deduction Reform Act of 2005

A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to revise the funding and deduction rules for multiemployer defined benefit plans, and for other purposes.
